text: Some people believe that the best way to control crime is to impose longer prison sentences. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
The only way to improve road safety is to give much stricter punishments for driving offenses. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
Some argue that universities should provide students with the skills they will need for the workplace, rather than teaching pure academic subjects. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
Many people believe that social networking sites have had a huge negative impact on both individuals and society. To what extent do you agree or disagree?

Some people think that all university students should study whatever they like. Others believe that they should only be allowed to study subjects that will be useful in the future, such as those related to science and technology. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
Government investment in the arts, such as music and theatre, is a waste of money. Governments must invest this money in public services instead. To what extent do you agree or disagree?

Some people believe that it is better to educate boys and girls in separate schools. Others, however, believe that boys and girls benefit more from attending mixed schools. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
Big salary is much more important than job satisfaction. Do you agree or disagree?

Some people say that the best way to improve public health is by increasing the number of sports facilities. Others, however, say that this would have little effect on public health and that other measures are required. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
Many scientists believe that now we can do anything we want with the help of technology. To what extent do you agree or disagree?

Some people believe that unpaid community service should be a compulsory part of high school programmes (for example working for a charity, improving the neighbourhood or teaching sports to younger children). To what extent do you agree or disagree?
The government should allocate more funding to teaching science rather than other subjects in order for a country to develop and progress. To what extent do you agree or disagree?

Some people think that strict punishments for driving offences are the key to reducing traffic accidents. Others, however, believe that other measures would be more effective in improving road safety. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.

In many countries, government spending on the arts is increasing. Some people think that this is a waste of money and that the government should spend this money on public services instead. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
Some people believe that employers should not be concerned about the way their employees dress, but only about the quality of their work. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
Some people think that the best way to ensure a happy life is to have a lot of money. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
With the rise of e-books, some people feel that printed books, newspapers, and magazines will soon disappear. To what extent do you agree or disagree?

Some people believe that children should be allowed to stay at home and play until they are six or seven years old. Others believe that it is important for young children to go to school as soon as possible. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.

Many people believe that the most effective way to ensure a healthy lifestyle is to exercise regularly. Others believe that a balanced diet is more important. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
Some people think that hosting an international sports event is good for the host country, while others think it brings more disadvantages. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
Some people think that zoos are cruel and should be closed down. Others, however, believe that zoos can be useful in protecting wild animals. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.

Some people believe that everyone has the right to university education. Others believe that university education should only be for those who are academically capable. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
Nowadays, more and more people decide to have children later in their lives. What are the reasons? Do the advantages of this outweigh the disadvantages?
Some people think that money is the best gift to give to teenagers, while others disagree. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.

Some people believe that professionals, such as doctors and engineers, should be required to work in the country where they did their training. Others believe they should be free to work in another country if they wish. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.

Some people think that parents should teach children how to be good members of society. Others, however, believe that school is the place to learn this. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
Some people think that it is good for a country's culture to import foreign films and TV programmes. Others think that it is better to produce these locally. Discuss both views and give your opinion.

Some people think that the best way to reduce crime is to increase the maximum prison sentence. Others, however, believe there are better alternative ways of reducing crime. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
Some people prefer to live in a house, while others feel that there are more advantages to living in an apartment. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.

Some people say that E-books and modern technology will totally replace traditional newspapers and magazines. Others say that traditional printed media will never disappear. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.

Computers are being used more and more in education. Some people say that this is a positive trend, while others argue that it is leading to negative consequences. Discuss both sides of this argument and then give your own opinion.
Some people believe that success in life comes from taking risks or chances. Others believe that success results from careful planning. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.

Some people believe that children should be allowed to stay at home and play until they are six or seven years old. Others believe that it is important for young children to go to school as soon as possible. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.

Some people think that detailed criminal descriptions on newspapers and TV have bad consequences, so this kind of information should be restricted. Others think that spreading this information is useful for the prevention of crime. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.

Some people say that the government should give health care the first priority, while others think there are more important priorities for taxpayers' money. Discuss both of these views and give your opinion.

Some people think that the increasing use of computers and mobile phones for communication has had a negative effect on young people's reading and writing skills. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
Some people think that libraries are a waste of money and resources because of the internet. Others believe they are still essential. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
Some people believe that old buildings should be protected by law. Others argue that they should be replaced by new buildings. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
Some people think that job satisfaction is more important than job security. Others think that having a permanent job is more important. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
Some people believe that studying history is a waste of time while others think that it is essential to learn from the past. Discuss both sides and give your opinion.

Some people think that dangerous sports such as skydiving and rock climbing should be banned. Others think that people should be free to choose whatever sport they want. Discuss both views and give your opinion.

Some people think that universities should provide graduates with the knowledge and skills needed in the workplace. Others think that the true function of a university should be to give access to knowledge for its own sake. Discuss both views and give your opinion.

Some people think that introducing new technology can improve the quality of life in developing countries. Others believe that free education should be offered. Discuss both views and give your opinion.

Some people feel that manufacturers and supermarkets have the responsibility to reduce the amount of packaging of goods, while others argue that customers should avoid buying goods with a lot of packaging. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
Some people say that protecting the environment is the government's responsibility. Others believe that every individual should be responsible for it. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
In some countries, young people are encouraged to work or travel for a year between finishing high school and starting university. Do the advantages of this outweigh the disadvantages?
Ideally, everyone would get a university education. Do you agree or disagree with this statement? Do the benefits of this outweigh the disadvantages?
The relentless rise in demand for consumer goods began in the twentieth century, and the world is now witnessing a consumption boom. Do the advantages of this trend outweigh the disadvantages?
Many people today prefer to socialize online rather than spending time with their friends in person. Is this a positive or negative development?

In many countries, more and more young people are leaving school and unable to find jobs. What problems do you think youth unemployment causes for the individual and for society? What measures should be taken to reduce the level of unemployment among young people?
International tourism has become a huge industry in the world. Do the problems of international tourism outweigh the benefits?
Some experts believe that it is better for children to begin learning a foreign language at primary school rather than secondary school. Do the advantages of this outweigh the disadvantages?
Today, more people are traveling than ever before. Why is this the case? What are the benefits of traveling for the traveler?
In many countries, plastic shopping bags are the main source of rubbish. They cause water and land pollution, so they should be banned. To what extent do you agree with this statement?
Nowadays many people choose to be self-employed rather than to work for a company or organisation. Why might this be the case? What could be the disadvantages of being self-employed?
Nowadays, more and more people are deciding to have children later in their lives. Do the advantages of this trend outweigh the disadvantages?
In many countries, people are buying more and more cheap consumer goods. Do the advantages of this trend outweigh the disadvantages?
More and more people are using the internet to do their shopping. Is this a positive or a negative development?

In some countries, secondary schools aim to provide a general education across a range of subjects. In others, children focus on a narrow range of subjects related to a particular career. Do the advantages of the second approach outweigh the disadvantages?
Today, many people use the internet to diagnose and treat their medical problems. Is this a positive or negative development?
Many people are working longer hours and have less time for leisure activities. Is this a positive or negative development?
More people are moving from rural areas to cities. Do the advantages of this trend outweigh the disadvantages?
In many workplaces, online communication is now more common than face-to-face meetings. Do the advantages of this outweigh the disadvantages?
Nowadays, it is easy to apply for and get a credit card. However, this has caused some people to have severe debt problems. Do the advantages of credit cards outweigh the disadvantages?
Some countries are investing heavily in space exploration. Do the advantages of space exploration outweigh the disadvantages?
Fewer people today write letters by hand. Is this a positive or a negative development?
Many museums and historical sites are mainly visited by tourists rather than local people. Why is this the case and what can be done to attract more local people?
Increasingly, people are choosing to live alone. What are the advantages and disadvantages of this trend?
In the future, it is expected that there will be a higher proportion of older people than young people in many countries. Is this a positive or negative development?
Many companies now use open-plan offices where employees work together in a large room. Do the advantages of this office layout outweigh the disadvantages?
In many cities, the use of private cars is increasing and causing traffic jams and pollution. What are the causes of this problem? What can be done to solve it?
The gap between the rich and the poor is becoming wider, the rich are getting richer and the poor even poorer. What problems can this situation cause and what can be done to reduce this gap?

In some countries the average weight of people is increasing and their levels of health and fitness are decreasing. What do you think are the causes of these problems and what measures could be taken to solve them?
Many people are moving from rural areas to big cities. Why has this movement taken place? What are the consequences of this behavior?
Global warming is one of the most serious issues that the world is facing today. What are the causes of global warming and what measures can governments and individuals take to tackle this issue?
Crime is becoming a serious problem in many major cities. What are the causes of this increase in crime? What solutions can you suggest?
The quality of life in many large cities is decreasing. What are the causes of this problem? What measures can be taken to solve it?
Many people feel that the family is not as important as it used to be. Why do you think this is? What are the effects of this on society?
Nowadays we are producing more and more rubbish. Why do you think this is happening? What can governments and individuals do to reduce the amount of rubbish produced?
Many young people nowadays are finding it difficult to find a job. What do you think are the main reasons for this? What solutions can you suggest?
In many countries, the amount of crime is increasing. What do you think are the main causes of crime? How can we deal with those causes?
Many small local shops are closing because customers travel to large shopping centers or malls. What are the consequences of this? What measures could be taken to solve this problem?
Despite improvements in vehicle technology, there are still large numbers of road accidents. How is this possible? What can be done to reduce the number of accidents?
Obesity is a major problem in many western countries. What are the main causes of this problem? What solutions can you suggest?
People are living longer than ever before. What problems does this cause for society? What can be done to solve these problems?
The cost of housing in many major cities is rising. What are the reasons for this? What can be done to solve this problem?
Many wild animals are on the verge of extinction. What are the reasons for this? What can be done to solve this problem?
In many schools, students' behavior is getting worse. What are the causes of this? What can be done to improve students' behavior?
Fresh water has become a scarce resource in some parts of the world. What are the causes of this? What measures can be taken to solve this problem?
More and more people are becoming addicted to their mobile phones. What are the reasons for this? What solutions can you suggest?
Plastic pollution is a major environmental problem. What are the causes of this? What can be done to reduce plastic pollution?
Work-related stress is becoming a common problem for many employees. What are the causes of this? What can employers do to help?
Many traditional skills and crafts are dying out. Why is this happening? What can be done to keep them alive?

The internet has transformed the way information is shared and consumed, but it has also created problems that did not exist before. What are the most serious problems associated with the internet and what solutions can you suggest?
In some countries, the number of young people who commit crimes is increasing. What are the reasons for this? What can be done to solve this problem?
